name: Burning Interface
description:
A typing puzzle anxiety simulator

  • To turn on a node, connect a node to another node.
  • To connect two or more nodes, hold the TAB key while clicking the appropriate keys for the nodes you want to connect.
  • To disconnect a node press its key without TAB engaged.
  • Match your nodes to the pattern provided in the bottom right corner of the screen.
  • Press ENTER to submit your pattern and move on to the next.
